summary:
Hammerfell Outfit V_1 by jase180

A very simple retex of the Hammerfell outfit.
descriptionHtml:
Hammerfell Outfit V_1 by jase180

A very simple retex of the Hammerfell outfit. I didn\'t like 

the color of the original so I did a quick edit to change 

them to a darker look, but still keeping a worn out well traveled look. I 

wanted this to feel the same, just darker and not so Aladdin 

like.

If somebody does a better job that would be great! I\'d like 

to make a version where the lower half of the face is covered 

with the scarf, but not sure how to make that work yet.

Feel free to endorse it if you like it! That would be swell



 - Installation Instructions - 
Extract the \'textures\' folder from the archive using WinRAR 

or 7Zip, and place it in your Skyrim\\Data folder. Overwrite 

if asked. 

Use as you want, just credit me :)
author: Jase180
